Row.Text: Contribute this city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards the Philosophers' Legacy project.
The Philosophers' Legacy is a pact between nations to contribute funding to the research and development of new weaponry, in an effort to further the power of the nations which pledge to it.
[ICON_GOLD] Gold costs of purchasing new units and upgrading existing units permanently reduced by 20%. (effect may take place the turn after project completion)
Earn 400 [ICON_GOLD] Gold (at Standard speed) for every Military Unit owned at the time the project is completed. (effect may take place the turn after project completion)

Begins the project to amass funds for the Philosophers' Legacy. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_PHILOSOPHERS_LEGACY_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_PHILOSOPHERS_LEGACY_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_PHILOSOPHERS_LEGACY_1_HELP}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Combined Arms.
You have put the highest amount of work into creating the Philosophers' Legacy, securing your position as the retainer of its microfilm. You have earned {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold!
